local_intent: Grasp the grape using the precomputed grasp pose with a brief align step, retry once if needed, then verify stability.
assumptions: Arm can approach and align to the grape within small tolerance
coherence_with_global: Uses the precomputed grasp pose 'grasp_grape' to execute Pick and verifies with IsGraspStable, matching the grasp phase of the global plan. Adds a minimal align step and limited retry consistent with careful handling.
